commit.message: Make use of NoHash hashing for FileId and CrateId

files.patch:
@@ -704,6 +704,7 @@ dependencies = [
  "ide-db",
  "itertools",
  "parser",
+ "stdx",
  "syntax",
  "test-utils",
  "text-edit",
@@ -1921,6 +1922,7 @@ dependencies = [
  "indexmap",
  "paths",
  "rustc-hash",
+ "stdx",
 ]
 
 [[package]]

@@ -12,6 +12,7 @@ doctest = false
 [dependencies]
 rustc-hash = "1.1.0"
 fst = "0.4.7"
+indexmap = "1.9.1"
 
 paths = { path = "../paths", version = "0.0.0" }
-indexmap = "1.9.1"
+stdx = { path = "../stdx", version = "0.0.0" }
